variable.name: LAUNCH_COMPONENT_GROUPS
variable.label: Launch Component Groups
variable.abstract: Comma separated list of components should start
variable.description: GATEWAY will start the API mediation layer which includes the API catalog, the API gateway, and the API discovery service. DESKTOP will start the Zowe desktop which includes the browser GUI for hosting Zowe applications. It will also start ZSS. ZSS will start the ZSS server without including the Desktop and Application Framework server. This can be used with Docker.

variable.name: APIML_ALLOW_ENCODED_SLASHES
variable.label: Allow encoded slashes
variable.abstract: Check to allow the Gateway to accept encoded characters in the URL requests
variable.description: When this parameter is set to true, the Gateway allows encoded characters to be part of URL requests redirected through the Gateway.

variable.abstract: Set to true to enable CORS for Gateway routes
variable.description: When this parameter is set to true, CORS are enabled in the API Gateway for Gateway routes

variable.description: Specifies the timeout for connection to the services in milliseconds.

variable.name: APIML_SECURITY_X509_ENABLED
variable.label: Enable X509 Security
variable.abstract: Enable the client certificate authentication through ZSS.
variable.description: Set this parameter to true, to enable the client certificate authentication functionality through ZSS.

variable.name: APIML_SECURITY_ZOSMF_APPLID

variable.description: The z/OSMF APPLID used for PassTicket.

variable.name: APIML_SECURITY_AUTH_PROVIDER

variable.abstract: Authentication provider used by the API Gateway.
variable.description: The authentication provider used by the API Gateway. By default, the API Gateway uses z/OSMF as an authentication provider. It is possible to switch to SAF as the authentication provider instead of z/OSMF.

variable.name: APIML_DEBUG_MODE_ENABLED
variable.label: Debug mode
variable.abstract: Choose whether you want detailed logging of the APIML.
variable.description: When this parameter is set to true, detailed logging of activity by the API mediation layer occurs. This can be useful to diagnose unexpected behavior of the API gateway, API discovery, or API catalog services. Default value is false.

variable.name: APIML_MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_ROUTE

variable.description: Set the maximum number of accepted connections per a single route in API Mediation Layer

variable.name: APIML_MAX_TOTAL_CONNECTIONS

variable.description: Set the maximum amount of all the connections for the API Mediation Layer

step.name: run_stc
step.title: Start the Zowe instance
step.description: This step starts the Zowe instance
step.instructions: Run this step to start the Zowe instance. If you want to start the instance manually (e.g. after IPL), you can do it with the following command: sh "${instance-zowe_instance_path}/bin/zowe-start.sh" You can also start the instance using the following operator command: S ZWESVSTC INSTANCE='${instance-zowe_instance_path}',JOBNAME=${instance-ZOWE_PREFIX}${instance-ZOWE_INSTANCE}SV Note: Operator commands can be issued from the SDSF command line if you are authorized to do so. In SDSF, operator commands are prefixed with the forward slash (/) character. To learn more about the task and how to stop it, please refer to the documentation at docs.zowe.org
